Text:
A 2 MB block size is used in this torrent. Uggh!

Why didn't you create it with a 512 KB block size instead?
With a smaller block size, the swarm replicates the data much faster and more efficiently.

Velvetfog:

Thanks for the info. I used BitTorrent 6.0 to create the Torrent and just assumed that it would create the most efficient method on its own. I'll certainly use your advice on the next ones.

Thanks!
